parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument to the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises.

parameters.name: body
parameters.value: "\"Error: might be a bad product name, check your input\""
